bioAsHtml:
After many years using Java (and loving it), I discovered Scala, at DevoxxFR in 2012. That was a blast. Since then, I became rather obsessed with that language and sought every opportunity to learn more about it, and about FP in general. I've learned what a monad is, and then I learned not to worry about what a monad is. I've learned about higher-kinded types and all sort of bizarre things only people who know why SI-2712 is a bad bug care about. Meanwhile, I met those people who care about SI-2712 and made some friends. Now, I thrive to share my enthusiasm about Scala with more and more people, and to make more friends by not talking too much about monads.

Also, I wear suits.
